attributes.description: The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack.
The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product.
The quantity of the product contained in the package along with its unit of measure.
The numeric net content portion that appears on an item.

summary: The page outlines various attributes related to apparel standards, including Total Count, Number of Pieces, Net Content, and Measure, specifying what each attribute entails and providing examples.
